mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, name, phone, address, address_detail created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password, name, phone, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, created_at AS createdAt FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password, name, phone, address, addressDetail AS addressDetail, created_at AS createdAt FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, WHERE user_id = #{userId}
